provider_arguments.info: api_key - (Required) The PowerDNS API key. This can also be specified with PDNS_API_KEY environment variable.
server_url - (Required) The address of PowerDNS server. This can also be specified with PDNS_SERVER_URL environment variable.

arguments.info: zone - (Required) The name of zone to contain this record.
name - (Required) The name of the record.
ttl - (Required) The TTL of the record.
records - (Required) A string list of records.
